item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013102201
item.description:
What's changed:

  • Hive is now translated to Danish, Dutch, French, German, Italian and Polish (more languages coming soon!)
  • updated JavaScript API for apps
  • minor updates to built-in apps

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013101401
item.description:
What's changed:

  • you can now add and edit avatars - drag & drop a file on the image area or just click the image and choose a file using the dialog
  • added keyboard navigation and improved mouse navigation in the autocomplete list in send window
  • added CoinMap link to the menu
  • added Seanâ€™s Outpost app
  • bundled apps are installed/updated every time Hive is updated
  • added blue higlight in the address box when copying address to clipboard
  • fixed an issue with deleting wallets when SPV data file is missing
  • various minor UI fixes

item.title: Hive 0.9 build 2013100401
item.description:
Note: if you're running an older build, you might get an "improperly signed" error - in this case you'll need to download the new version manually from the site. Sorry about that :\

What's changed:

  • you can now edit your profile (name, email)
  • address validation and better error handling in the send window
  • if the contacts or transactions list is empty, a nice view will be displayed explaining what that list is for
  • new transactions should always be added at the top of the list
  • fixed moving between contact form fields with the Tab key
